price: 28. Wuxuuna ka yeelay Kalimadda7 (Towxiidka) mid ku baaqi ah durriyaddiisa dhexdooda8, si ay (Xaqa) ugu noqdaan.
arabic: وَجَعَلَهَا كَلِمَةَۢ بَاقِيَةٗ فِي عَقِبِهِۦ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes:
7. Waa Kalimada Laa ilaaha illal Laah. 
8. Nabi Ibraahiim c.s. wuxuu ka dhigay towxiidka wax ku baaqi ah firkiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalahā kalimatan bāqiyatan fī ʿaqibihi laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
